parameters.name: DbNodeIds
parameters.description: The node list in the destination apsaradb for PolarDB cluster. The nodes in each cluster are separated with commas (,) and colons (:).

parameters.name: DrdsInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of a DRDS instance.

parameters.name: Weights
parameters.description: The weight of the PolarDB cluster. Separate multiple weights with commas (,).
